name: Mission: GALAZA [demo]
description:
Willing to fulfill the mission, pilot and his spacecraft GALAZA are forced to face dangers of deadly Universe 8-3K.

Mission: GALAZA is an old-style 2D shooter game, with unique graphics, for PC (Windows), tributed to a famous, arcade game - GALAGA.

So far: Demo version.
  • Explore dangerous Universe and gather Crystalium on planets.
  • Modify your spacecraft (buy engines, shield, guns)
  • Hire crewmates (navigator, mechanic or gunner)
  • ...and fight against hostile combats of bug-creatures
